t: Elmer Chocolate - Wikipedia
s: September 12, 2024 - Elmer Candy Corporation is a confectionery company that was founded in 1855 as the Miller Candy Company in New Orleans, Louisiana. The company sells seasonal holiday candies and, in 2014, was the second-largest manufacturer of Valentine boxed chocolate in North America.
